### Checklist
- [ ] `pack.json` includes `id`, `version`, and `roles[]`
- [ ] All `prompt_file` paths exist
- [ ] Pack validates with `python3 tools/validate_pack.py <pack_path>`
- [ ] Added short usage notes in README/docs (if needed)
